title: The Herd-HOUR-1-NBA playoffs, Baker Mayfield, Zion
itunes:title: The Herd-HOUR-1-NBA playoffs, Baker Mayfield, Zion
description:
Colin talks about the Lakers-Blazers match up, Baker Mayfield's recent comments, and why the Pelicans HC opening is a dangerous job.

Guest: Doug Gottlieb
